Description: VIRTUALLY NEW, STUDIO ENVIRONMENT...COMES WITH A 4 SWITCH PEDAL If you have ever seen the movie High Plains Drifter, you may recall his side kick Mordecai. What Mordecai lacked in size and stature he made up for in wallup. We felt like this was the perfect name for this amplifier. The stock voice of the Mordecai is a cross between the mid 60s southern California sound and its larger sibling the High Plains Drifter, It presents with a more scooped midrange, and chimey jangle than the High Plains Drifter.The Mordecai has a more immediate and punchy feel versus the High-Plains_Drifter,n ot to mention it is quite a bit more compact and portable at 46lbs and just slightly taller than a Bludodrive. SPECS 100W RMS standard 50W version available by special request 50W version also available with Tube Rectifier 6L6 or EL34/6CA7 output tubes (Customer choice) foot switchable pre amp boost foot switchable mid boost foot switchable FET or Reverb (customer choice at no charge) Available as a head or 1x12 combo Available in 3 voicings, standard, bludophonix and baby drifter.
Title: Bludotone Mortecai Amplifier
